description: Returns the definition of a specific DataBrew recipe corresponding to a particular version.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the recipe to be described.

nested_items.name: CreatedBy
nested_items.description: The identifier (user name) of the user who created the recipe.

nested_items.name: CreateDate
nested_items.description: The date and time that the recipe was created.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedBy
nested_items.description: The identifier (user name) of the user who last modified the recipe.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedDate
nested_items.description: The date and time that the recipe was last modified.

nested_items.name: ProjectName
nested_items.description: The name of the project associated with this recipe.

nested_items.name: PublishedBy
nested_items.description: The identifier (user name) of the user who last published the recipe.

nested_items.name: PublishedDate
nested_items.description: The date and time when the recipe was last published.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the recipe.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the recipe.

nested_items.name: Steps
nested_items.description: One or more steps to be performed by the recipe. Each step consists of an action, and the conditions under which the action should succeed.

nested_items.name: Operation
nested_items.description: The name of a valid DataBrew transformation to be performed on the data.

nested_items.name: Parameters
nested_items.description: Contextual parameters for the transformation.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ConditionExpressions
nested_items.description: One or more conditions that must be met for the recipe step to succeed.

nested_items.name: Condition
nested_items.description: A specific condition to apply to a recipe action. For more information, see Recipe structure in the Glue DataBrew Developer Guide.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: A value that the condition must evaluate to for the condition to succeed.

nested_items.name: TargetColumn
nested_items.description: A column to apply this condition to.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ResourceArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the recipe.

nested_items.name: RecipeVersion
nested_items.description: The recipe version identifier.
